<h3 id="X24178">X(24178)&nbsp;=&nbsp; (A,B,C,X(2); A',B',C',X(2)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(65), WHERE A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(514)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3 b + a^2 b^2 + a b^3 + b^4 + a^3 c - 4 a^2 b c - 3 a b^2 c + a^2 c^2 - 3 a b c^2 - 2 b^2 c^2 + a c^3 + c^4 : :
